name: Mothman's Forest
description:
In “Mothman’s Forest,” you play as the mysterious cryptid known as Mothman, wandering through the forest and using your hypnotic powers to harvest gullible travelers who dare to enter your territory.

As you make your way through the game, you must use stealth and cunning to terrify the travelers without being seen. The more scared the travelers are, the easier it will be for you to bend them to your will. Can you become the ultimate master of the forest, or will the travelers find a way to escape your grasp?!

Scare traveler by making sound near him.
Scare traveler by show yourself. But be carefull, light weaken you.
Once the traveler is scared, you have to hypnotize him to harvest him.
